title: GOFood
description: An online food delivery app using React, Node.js, MongoDB, Express.js, and Bootstrap. Features login, cart management, and future plans for more capabilities.

title: EmailGenie
description: Chrome extension using Gemini AI to automate Gmail replies, boosting productivity and reducing effort.

title: RouteMate
description: Backend for ride-sharing with booking system, role-based authentication, and live location tracking using Spring Boot and PostGIS.

title: Portfolio
description: My personal developer portfolio built using Next.js, React, Node.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: Job-Application (Ongoing)
description: A job application system built with Java microservices, Spring Boot, Docker, AWS, and RabbitMQ.
